title: No enemy attack will halt the victorious construction of socialism in our country (Soviet poster, 1931)
Text: No enemy attack will halt the victorious construction of socialism in our country. Text on the factory flags reads  ‘The Five-Year Plan in Four Years’. Text on the counterrevolutionaries’ flags reads  ‘Forward’ (in reference to the Social Democratic newspaper Vorwärts), ‘Menshevik Bulletin’ and ‘Falsehoods’.
Publisher: State Publishing House of the RSFSR.
Additional Information: Stalin standing steadfast against counterrevolution, represented by the church, a social democrat, a Menshevik and a Trotskyite.
